lead_paragraph: DAVIDSON--Edward W.,died peacefully on April 6, 2016 at age 87. He was an extraordinary person who enjoyed life to the fullest. Ed was a lifelong entrepreneur and successful commercial real estate broker and investor, who was also an Eagle Scout, former board member of Fair Lawn Jewish Center and a volunteer at Valley Hospital. Ed was beloved by his late wife Alix and his children, Beth D. Mendick and husband Michael; Julie; and Paul and wife Grace, as well as his grandchildren, Haley, Rachel, Daniel and Emily, his brothers Alan and Franklin and their respective wives Pat and Carol and his entire extended family and many friends. Funeral 11:00am Friday, April 8 at Louis Suburban Chapel in Fair Lawn, NJ. Burial to follow in Maimonides Cemetery, Elmont, Long Island. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  DAVIDSON, EDWARD W.
